section.title: @XmlRootElement and unmarshalling
section.para: Classes with XmlRootElement can be unmarshalled from XML elements simply by invoking the unmarshal method that takes one parameter. This is the simplest mode of unmarshalling.

However, sometimes you may need to unmarshal an instance of a type that does not have an XmlRootElement. For example, you might dynamically find out at the runtime that a certain element has a certain type.
